name: Come on,Fantasy baby!
storyline:
You were once a complete failure in life, fired from your job and buried under a mountain of debt, relentlessly pursued by creditors, and plunged into despair. However, by a stroke of luck, you accidentally ordered girls from another world through a vending machine. They are not just your servants; they are the key to restarting your life.
Since their appearance, your days have been filled with irresistible and exhilarating experiences. From warm morning wake-up calls to sweet companionship at night, every moment is packed with fun and surprises.
However, happiness always comes hand-in-hand with challenges. Together, you face numerous difficulties, such as scheming from your former boss, threats from creditors, and occasional emotional conflicts among the group. Each girl has her own backstory and growth trajectory. With your help and choices, they gradually find their place and value in the world of live streaming.
Ultimately, with intelligence and courage, you and the girls successfully thwart the villains’ plots and achieve an incredible turnaround in your lives. But, is the story really as it seems?
summary: Watch out for a heart-throbbing adventure! Let us take you into an ideal world for men, where you can control and save various Korean beauties from different dimensions, each with their own unique style. Every day unfolds an irresistible and exhilarating fantasy life.
